add_library(external INTERFACE)

add_subdirectory(abseil-cpp)
add_subdirectory(googletest)
add_subdirectory(status_macros)
#[[
target_link_libraries(external
                      INTERFACE
                      status_macros
                      absl::algorithm
                      absl::base
                      absl::cleanup
                      #absl::container
                      #absl::copts
                      absl::debugging
                      absl::flags
                      #absl::functional
                      absl::hash
                      absl::log
                      absl::memory
                      absl::meta
                      absl::numeric
                      #absl::profiling
                      #absl::random
                      absl::strings
                      absl::status
                      absl::synchronization
                      absl::time
                      #absl::types
                      absl::utility)]]
